spec.name: Imperial Army Cadet
spec.subtitle: Rebellious Students
spec.description: To many individual in these times, the Empire represents stability and order. It is responsible for having saved them from the Separatists and the traitorous Jedi Order. The Imperial military, specifically, offers opportunities to serve that body in addition to the promise of patriotic fulfillment, exploration, and power. For those who haven't experienced the Empire's oppression, these can be powerful motivators to join up. Many adventurous souls desiring to escape the inevitability of a life without excitement or advancement have looked to the Imperial academies as a way to venture into the wider galaxy. Depending on the academy, however, even getting accepted can be a highly competitive affair, in which only the most naturally talented candidates have a chance - unless, of course, a candidate's family is connected.

talents.description: Gain +1 Strain Threshold

talents.name: Vehicle Combat Training
talents.description: Gunnery and Piloting (Planetary) become career skills.

talents.name: Conditioned
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Conditioned from Athletics and Coordination checks. Reduce the damage and strain suffered from falling by 1 per rank of Conditioned.

talents.name: Knowledge Specialization
talents.description: When acquired, choose 1 Knowledge skill. When making that skill check, may spend 1 Triumph result to gain additional successes equal to ranks in Knowledge Specialization.

talents.name: Know the Enemy
talents.description: The character may use Knowledge (Warfare) skill when making checks to determine Initiative.

talents.name: By the Book
talents.description: Once per encounter, before making a combat check, the character may suffer 2 strain to add Advantage to the results equal to his ranks in By the Book.

talents.name: Defensive Driving
talents.description: Increase defense of vehicle or starship being piloted by 1 per rank of Defensive Driving.

talents.name: Tactical Combat Training
talents.description: Melee and Ranged (Heavy) become career skills.

talents.name: Formation Tactics
talents.description: May take the Formation Tactics action by making a Hard Leadership check. If successful, choose a number of allies within short range equal to Success generated. Upgrade the difficulty of attacks against these allies once until the end of next turn.

talents.name: Command
talents.description: Add 1 Boost per rank of Command when making Leadership checks. Affected targets add 1 Boost to Discipline checks for next 24 hours.

talents.name: Full Throttle
talents.description: Take a Full Throttle action: make a Hard Piloting check ot increase a vehicle's top speed by 1 for a number of rounds equal to Cunning.

talents.name: Known Schematic
talents.description: Once per session, may perform the Known Schematic maneuver: make a Hard Knowledge (Education) check. Success grants familiarity with a building or ship's design.

talents.name: Improved Formation Tactics
talents.description: The difficulty of Formation Tactics is reduced to Average. May spend 1 Triumph or 6 Advantage to have effect last until end of encounter.
